bug.author: manycoding
bug.summary: String index is not supported - TypeError: unsupported operand type(s) for +: 'int' and 'str'
bug.description:
Describe the bug Something wrong with freqtable, I cannot add anything particular yet. To Reproduce <denchmark-code>import pandas as pd import pandas_profiling data = {'author': ['Kellymom', 'Tori'], 'body': ["love this shampoo and conditioner set it smells awesome it's hydrating so when you wash your hair it's softer and easier to manage. they're not full size containers they are a bit smaller not too much smaller because it's still a great value as you would consider that one of these is almost $4 and that for two of them it's just under 5 it's a great deal is what I'm saying.", 'Absolutely love this shampoo and conditioner! The poducts i was using were gettjng too expensive so i needed to change and im so glad i did. Ive been using the hello hydration for 3 days now and i can already tell a huge difference. I have naturally really curly hair and after using these products my hair feels instantly softer. I highly recommend buying hello hydration if you want to have softer smoother hair without paying a fortune!'], 'brand_name': ['Herbal Essences', 'Herbal Essences'], 'collection_key': ['218035411', '217516866'], 'crawl_date': ['2019-06-26', '2019-06-26'], 'crawler_name': ['test_walmart_ca_category', 'test_walmart_ca_category'], 'currency': ['CAD', 'CAD'], 'date': ['2019-06-09 17:48:53', '2019-05-19 01:10:13'], 'discount': [nan, nan], 'model_number': ['07414', '07414'], 'page_number': [1, 1], 'price': ['5.96', '5.96'], 'product_id': ['6000196476893', '6000196476893'], 'product_image': ['https://i5.walmartimages.ca/images/Large/739/044/6000197739044.jpg', 'https://i5.walmartimages.ca/images/Large/739/044/6000197739044.jpg'], 'product_name': ['Herbal Essences Hello Hydration Shampoo and Conditioner with Coconut Essences Dual Pack', 'Herbal Essences Hello Hydration Shampoo and Conditioner with Coconut Essences Dual Pack'], 'product_source_url': ['https://www.walmart.ca/en/ip/herbal-essences-hello-hydration-shampoo-and-conditioner-with-coconut-essences-dual-pack/6000196476893', 'https://www.walmart.ca/en/ip/herbal-essences-hello-hydration-shampoo-and-conditioner-with-coconut-essences-dual-pack/6000196476893'], 'rate': [5.0, 5.0], 'review_source_url': ['https://www.walmart.ca/en/ip/herbal-essences-hello-hydration-shampoo-and-conditioner-with-coconut-essences-dual-pack/6000196476893', 'https://www.walmart.ca/en/ip/herbal-essences-hello-hydration-shampoo-and-conditioner-with-coconut-essences-dual-pack/6000196476893'], 'review_url': ['https://www.walmart.ca/en/ip/herbal-essences-hello-hydration-shampoo-and-conditioner-with-coconut-essences-dual-pack/6000196476893', 'https://www.walmart.ca/en/ip/herbal-essences-hello-hydration-shampoo-and-conditioner-with-coconut-essences-dual-pack/6000196476893'], 'source': ['walmart_ca', 'walmart_ca'], 'title': ['have to have it', 'Must buy!'], 'total_number_of_pages': [68, 68], 'type': ['review', 'review'], 'url': ['https://www.walmart.ca/en/personal-care/hair-care/shampoo/N-4084', 'https://www.walmart.ca/en/personal-care/hair-care/shampoo/N-4084']} pd.DataFrame(data).profile_report()
/.local/share/virtualenvs/arche-lm24e12g/lib/python3.7/site-packages/pandas_profiling/view/report.py in freq_table(freqtable, n, table_template, max_number_to_print, idx, nb_col) 39 min_freq = 0 40 ---> 41 freq_missing = n - sum(freqtable) 42 max_freq = max(freqtable.values[0], freq_other, freq_missing) 43
TypeError: unsupported operand type(s) for +: 'int' and 'str' </denchmark-code>
Version information: pandas-profiling 2.0.3 Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment:
Thank you for reporting this. Running a special test case for this problem does not produce the same error. We need some more detailed information. Could you attach some details on your environment setup (pip freeze > frozen-requirements.txt)? from numpy import nan
import pandas as pd import pandas_profiling
def test_issue200(): data = { "author": ["Kellymom", "Tori"], "body": [ "love this shampoo and conditioner set it smells awesome it's hydrating so when you wash your hair it's softer and easier to manage. they're not full size containers they are a bit smaller not too much smaller because it's still a great value as you would consider that one of these is almost $4 and that for two of them it's just under 5 it's a great deal is what I'm saying.", "Absolutely love this shampoo and conditioner! The poducts i was using were gettjng too expensive so i needed to change and im so glad i did. Ive been using the hello hydration for 3 days now and i can already tell a huge difference. I have naturally really curly hair and after using these products my hair feels instantly softer. I highly recommend buying hello hydration if you want to have softer smoother hair without paying a fortune!", ], "brand_name": ["Herbal Essences", "Herbal Essences"], "collection_key": ["218035411", "217516866"], "crawl_date": ["2019-06-26", "2019-06-26"], "crawler_name": ["test_walmart_ca_category", "test_walmart_ca_category"], "currency": ["CAD", "CAD"], "date": ["2019-06-09 17:48:53", "2019-05-19 01:10:13"], "discount": [nan, nan], "model_number": ["07414", "07414"], "page_number": [1, 1], "price": ["5.96", "5.96"], "product_id": ["6000196476893", "6000196476893"], "product_image": [ "https://i5.walmartimages.ca/images/Large/739/044/6000197739044.jpg", "https://i5.walmartimages.ca/images/Large/739/044/6000197739044.jpg", ], "product_name": [ "Herbal Essences Hello Hydration Shampoo and Conditioner with Coconut Essences Dual Pack", "Herbal Essences Hello Hydration Shampoo and Conditioner with Coconut Essences Dual Pack", ], "product_source_url": [ it", "Must buy!"], "total_number_of_pages": [68, 68], "type": ["review", "review"], "url": [ "https://www.walmart.ca/en/personal-care/hair-care/shampoo/N-4084", <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sbrugman>@sbrugman</denchmark-link> I found the problem - str index:
Thanks for your efforts, will be fixed in the next version!
